name: Tiefling
description: Tieflings are derived from human bloodlines, and in the broadest possible sense, they still look human. However, their infernal heritage has left a clear imprint on their appearance.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

traits.name: Hellish Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to fire damage.

features.name: Infernal Legacy
features.description: You know the Thaumaturgy cantrip. At 3rd level you can cast Hellish Rebuke as a 2nd-level spell once per long rest. At 5th level you can cast Darkness once per long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

spells.name: Thaumaturgy
spells.description: You manifest a minor wonder, a sign of supernatural power: your voice booms, your eyes flash, flames flicker, or the ground trembles.
